faq.a: Copy trading allows you to automatically replicate the trades of experienced traders or AI strategies in your own account. When the strategy trades, your account mirrors those actions proportionally.

faq.q: Do I need trading experience to copy trade?
faq.a: No. Copy trading is designed for beginners. You don‚Äôt place trades manually‚Äîyour role is to choose a strategy, manage risk settings, and monitor performance.

faq.q: Can I lose money with copy trading?
faq.a: Yes. All trading involves risk. Copy trading reduces the need for decision-making, but it does not remove market risk. This is why risk controls and drawdown limits are important.
Within Pandora AI, strategies focus on liquid markets such as Forex and Gold, which are widely traded and commonly used in automated systems.

faq.q: What is drawdown and why does it matter?
faq.a: Drawdown refers to how much an account can decline from its highest value. Pandora AI strategies are designed with a predefined maximum drawdown of 10% to help manage downside risk, and all strategies are configured to manage stoploss within these parameters

faq.q: What is an amplified or instant funded account?
faq.a: An amplified (instant funded) account multiplies your trading exposure relative to your deposit. For example, a 10x amplified account means your capital is increased tenfold for trading purposes‚Äîwhile risk limits remain clearly defined.

faq.q: Why does using a regulated broker matter?
faq.a: A regulated broker like Axis Capital Group operates under financial oversight, must meet compliance standards, and follows rules around client fund handling, reporting, and transparency.

faq.q: Do I send money to Pandora AI?
faq.a: No. Funds are held in your own broker account. Pandora provides strategies and community access‚Äîit does not custody client funds.

faq.q: Can Pandora AI access my money?
faq.a: No. Pandora strategies can trade on your account only via permissioned systems (such as copy trading setups). Withdrawals always remain under your control.

faq.q: Can I stop copy trading at any time?
faq.a: Yes. You can pause or disconnect from a strategy whenever you choose, subject to broker platform rules.

faq.q: Is Pandora AI an affiliate program?
faq.a: Pandora AI has a structured referral and commission system, withing Axis Capital Groups, Sub IB environment. (IB = Introducing Broker, often compared to an affiliate in other industries)

faq.q: Do I need to recruit people to earn?
faq.a: No. Many members participate purely as copy traders. Networking is optional and suited to those who enjoy community building and education.

Commissions withing the Pandora AI project may be generated from:
